title: Did the notebook "The Deranged Friend " come from a silent film in 1920?
subtitle: To say that Charlie Chaplin invented a "dispersed friend" Mimi is a bit difficult, but an early version of the viral picture can be detected in the 1922 short film "Ransom Day."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The silent film Charlie Chaplin of 1920s still resembles Mimi on the Internet popular after almost a century.
